name: Space Time Travel
description:
SPACE - Press and hold to make your character fly

A / D  - Horizontal movement

It's a game where life is in space. You can either be an astronaut, a rocket or a car.

 Your goal is make until the teletransportation point to travel to the future, but be careful with the obstacles along the way. You can follow the yellow arrows to make it easy to get to the telestransportation spot. You don't get any points for collecting the arrows, but you can try just for the challenge :)
